prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (imposing military dictator:1.3), muscular physique, piercing glowing white eyes, intense commanding expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture on face, (no exposed skin on torso or arms:1.5), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching sharp red officer uniform with silver plates:1.5), (matching large officer cap:1.2), film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, mannequin, cgi, 3d render, smooth skin, low quality, (bare chest:2.0), (red skin:1.5), (no uniform:1.5), friendly, thin build
